channel.title: A few questions
channel.description: Ok sometimes when I am on the privite server I use ::pickup... and when I equip the Idem i loose connection and when it comes back up I am stuck. 2nd question How do I put in the IP address all they give u is something like pkftw.hopto.org or something and u got to put in something like 58.22.101.138 in the server IP spot. How do u edit the NPC's? And a lot of them times when I try the 58.22.101.138 it says its down a lot of the times and when I get on finaly ppl are on it.

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Pickup, on the server you use, may be disable. If it’s not your server, you can’t fix that.
File > Server IP should change it, or most clients let you just click that line and backspace.
NPC’s are in the server folder; multiple files, all depending on what you want to edit.
58.22.101.138 Is not always on which is why it doesn’t work sometimes. And when people are online and it does work, that means it’s on.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

u connect to 127.0.0.1
not sure with others sorry

Read full topic
